high_descs: Turn to face the CDs on the desk.
Pick up the CD closest to you.
Walk to the right of the desk where the lamp is.
anns.task_desc: Look at a CD by the light of a lit lamp.

high_descs: Look down at the desk in front of the chair.
Pick up the CD that's closest to you on the desk.
Turn around and walk to the edge of the desk on the left.
Turn on the lamp that;s on the desk.
anns.task_desc: To pick up a CD and turn on the lamp.

high_descs: ace the desk that you are standing in front of and focus your attention to the two cds sitting on the desk
Pick up the cd that is closest to you, the one that is not sitting by the phone
Turn right and walk to the bed, then left and walk to the end of the desk that is by the potted plant
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine a cd by the light of a lamp
